H0.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. Atlantic Records

H1.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. EMI Records

H2.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. Warner Bros. Records

H3.text: Throughout the 80s and 90s Phil Collins recorded on which record label. The Pond

A4.text: Phil Collins signed with Virgin Records and WEA for American distribution in 1981.

A5.text: Phil Collins signed with Virgin Records in the UK as a solo act in 1981.
